title: You 2.0: Our Pursuit of Happiness
description: Sometimes, life can feel like being stuck on a treadmill. No matter how hard you try to get happier, you end up back where you started. What's going on here? We kick off our annual You 2.0 summer series with happiness researcher Elizabeth Dunn, who explains how to fight the treadmill feeling.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
